content: {"name": "Interfaith Assistance Ministry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We cannot assist anyone who does not live in Henderson County, N.C.\nIf you are planning to seek financial assistance from IAM later after 2:30 p.m., please call ahead to make sure we will be able to assist you that day. Call (828) 697-7029 and select Option 2 for more information. ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.iam-hc.org/get-help", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "310 Freeman Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hendersonville", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28792", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.33622529999999, "longitude": -82.4434466}, "phones": [{"number": "(828) 697-7029", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Pet food upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Available assistance for gas and electric bill"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing and hygiene items may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
